messages.speech: There are many official departments, offices and kiosks which offer comprehensive information regarding the destinations, travel options, accommodation, booking and a host of other information, considered really useful for tourists visiting the state. You can get all the information required for planning your itinerary in Telangana and experience a worthwhile journey touring the unique destinations of the state.

Central Reservation Offices
Hyderabad
